code: import axios from'axios';import ENV from'./../config/base-env';export const get=token=>{return axios.get("".concat(ENV.API,"/profile"),{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const update=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('name',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.name);formData.set('phone',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.phone);formData.set('_method','PUT');return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/profile"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const changePassword=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('current_password',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.current_password);formData.set('new_password',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.new_password);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/profile/change-password"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const checkUsername=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('username',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.username);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/profile/check-username"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const updateUsername=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('username',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.username);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/profile/change-username"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};export const changePicture=(params,token)=>{let formData=new FormData();formData.set('image',params===null||params===void 0?void 0:params.image);return axios.post("".concat(ENV.API,"/profile/change-picture"),formData,{headers:{Authorization:token}});};
